name: Snake of Life (Grzybojad)
description:
A simple 3D snake game with "smooth rotation". Eat as many apples as you can without biting your tail.

Controls
  • Use A/D, left/right arrows to control the snake
  • Hold space to speed up
  • Press ESC to pause the game

You can also use an Xbox 360 controller.

This game was created using the Unity engine.
Source code available here: https://github.com/Grzybojad/Snake-of-Life
